about.title: About Me
about.description:
Full-Stack Developer | Expert in React, Node.js, Java and C#


I'm a full-stack developer passionate about transforming ideas into efficient and scalable digital solutions. With extensive experience in modern web technologies, I work in both frontend and backend, creating agile, secure, and intuitive applications. My software development expertise allows me to build robust systems, focusing on performance and the best user experience.


I constantly seek to improve my skills and explore new technologies to deliver solutions that truly make a difference. Shall we build something amazing together? ðŸš€

wisewallet.title: WiseWallet
wisewallet.description: Personal and family finance management system with income, expense, and investment tracking. Features smart categorization, reports, goals, and budgets, helping users make more conscious and effective financial decisions. Also enables collaborative management.

wisepark.title: WisePark
wisepark.description: An advanced parking management system that enables efficient control of vehicle entry and exit. It includes features such as detailed vehicle registration, report and chart generation, shared access for collaborative management, and real-time occupancy monitoring, ensuring better organization and security.

advogada.title: Lawyer's Professional Page
advogada.description: Landing page designed to showcase a lawyer, highlighting her practice areas, experience, and credibility. It features a modern and responsive design, along with a direct email contact form, making it easy for potential clients to get in touch.
